column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Got the spicy umami and Tokyo tonkatsu ramen
column2: they were ok. Had a lot of flavor and good portion. Â If you like to eat meat
column3: request for more as they give you a lot of noodles. The broth is super thick
column4: and the pork chaschu had abit too much flavor
column5: could be toned down a bit. Wait time was about 5 minutes on a Monday night
column6: so wasn't too bad. If you like broth that isn't too thick
column7: Tiger Den is a good place to go.
